import { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; const Popup = ({message, handleFunction,params}) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); function closePopup() { setIsOpen(false); } function openPopup() { setIsOpen(true); } function handleConfirm() { handleFunction(params); closePopup(); } return ( <>
​

{message}

); } export default Popup
